svg.text: Sahoo, Arriola, Schiff, Gokaslan, Marber, Sahami, Kuleshov (2024)
Key Insight: Use [MASK] token as the "absorbing state" (like noise in continuous diffusion)
Prob. of revealing token at step t
MDLM provides the simplest and most principled framework for discrete diffusion language modeling
• Clean continuous-time formulation • Single cross-entropy loss • Competitive with autoregressive models
• Theoretical guarantees via ELBO • Flexible generation with variable step counts
Foundation for Dream 7B and other large-scale diffusion LLMs
